entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning. Flurries and rain showers late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon then southwest 30 gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
